data.text: Flew with @Delta and they are a bunch of liars. The call center told me that they were going to give me one thing to then at the gate tell me otherwise and the gate agents rude,  said no, overall terrible experience.

urls.title: Istanbul, Turkey to Los Angeles, USA for only €379 roundtrip (Jan-Mar dates)
urls.description: Cheap flights from Istanbul, Turkey to Los Angeles, USA for only €379 roundtrip with KLM and Delta Air Lines.

data.text: @Delta hi I had e credits from 3 different people that I initially paid for but I was wondering if you could put them all under my name please?
